categories: Category:Victory I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Hunter was a Victory I-class Star Destroyer belonging to the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

Along with Immobilizer 418 cruiser Claw, the Hunter attempted to stop a number of Rebels who were heading to Kothlis after stealing a top secret computer from the Imperial freighter Suprosa. However, despite help from Assault Gunboats and its own TIE/LN starfighters the Claw was successfully driven off and the Rebels reached Kothlis safely.
